text: Imi vanhu! Enzaniso yakava inopuhwa, saka iteererei (zvakadzama). Zvirokwazvo, avo vamunonamata muchisiya Allah, havakwanisi kana kusika nhunzi, kunyangwe vakaungana kuti vazviite. Uye kana nhunzi ikatora chimwe chinhu kubva kwavari, havana simba rekuchibvisa (rekuchitora) kubva kwairi (nhunzi). Vanotsvaga uye vanotsvagwa vese havana simba
